mapper.select: select r.mat_req_id, b.bus_name, r.mat_id, m.mat_name, a.arr_qt, to_char(arr_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') arr_date from mat_req r left join material m on r.mat_id = m.mat_id left join business b on r.bus_id = b.bus_id left join arr_material a on r.mat_req_id = a.mat_req_id where r.mat_req_stat='도착' order by mat_req_id
